result.ga: Col seisir le Máire a bhí inti
result.orig: Col seisir le Máire a bhí inti
result.html: Col seisir le Máire a bhí intiShe was Máire's second cousin.
result.ponchtml: Col seisir le Máire a ḃí intiShe was Máire's second cousin.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ga: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.orig: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.html: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing sé air leaḃar scríoḃ dornán inti agus ḋruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.eng: She is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.html: Níl méid nó meáchan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.ponchtml: Níl méid nó meáċan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.

result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.orig: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.html: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbhYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ponchtml: Tá Babaí inleiṫscéil go fóill nó níl inti aċ luspairt linḃYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.orig: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.html: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ aige dóiḃ aċ truaiġ gan tarrṫáil a ḃí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
